trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the server or the client cannot be reached for a previously specified period of time.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod når serveren eller klienten ikke kan nås for en tidligere angitt tidsrom.

trans-unit.source: The RemotingTimeoutException is thrown when a remoting call does not complete in the specified timeout time.
trans-unit.target: RemotingTimeoutException forårsakes når en ekstern kommunikasjon kall ikke fullføres tidspunkt angitt tidsavbrudd.

trans-unit.source: RemotingTimeoutException uses the HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING, which has the value 0x8013150B.
trans-unit.target: RemotingTimeoutException bruker HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING, som har verdien 0x8013150B.

trans-unit.source: RemotingTimeoutException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: RemotingTimeoutException bruker standard <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>implementering, som støtter referanse likhet.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of RemotingTimeoutException, see the RemotingTimeoutException constructors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av RemotingTimeoutException, kan du se RemotingTimeoutException konstruktører.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException"> </xref> klasse standardegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|Localized error message for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av klassen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Lokaliserte feilmelding for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>|</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException"></xref> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt melding.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> class: |Property Type|Condition| |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av klassen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>: | Egenskapstype | Betingelse | |-------------------|---------------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Den `message` streng |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som angir årsak hvorfor unntaket oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception must include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inneholde en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen returnerer den samme verdien som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av klassen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Internt unntak-referanse | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `InnerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `InnerException` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
